p: Individuals typically presented at Shanghai’s district hospitals (including SPHCC). Real-time reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT–PCR) assay for confirming SARS-CoV-2 infection were conducted in local Centres for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) according to WHO protocols [ 5]. Patients with positive nucleic acid test results were transferred to SPHCC for further treatment using negative pressure ambulances.
